org.symphonyoss.symphony.clients

Class AuthenticationClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.symphonyoss.symphony.clients.AuthenticationClient

  • public class AuthenticationClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Authentication client to support retrieval of session, key tokens.

    Tokens are used by most REST API endpoint calls to validate access.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AuthenticationClient(java.lang.String sessionUrl, java.lang.String keyUrl)
      Construct client implementation with session and key endpoints
      AuthenticationClient(java.lang.String sessionUrl, java.lang.String keyUrl, javax.ws.rs.client.Client httpClient)
      Construct client implementation with session and key endpoints with overridden HTTP client
      AuthenticationClient(java.lang.String sessionUrl, java.lang.String keyUrl, javax.ws.rs.client.Client httpClientForSessionToken, javax.ws.rs.client.Client httpClientForKeyToken)
      Construct client implementation with session and key endpoints with two different overridden HTTP clients for session-token and key-token

      • AuthenticationClient

        public AuthenticationClient(java.lang.String sessionUrl,
                            java.lang.String keyUrl)
        Construct client implementation with session and key endpoints
        Parameters:
        sessionUrl - Session Service URL base endpoint
        keyUrl - Key Service URL base endpoint

      • AuthenticationClient

        public AuthenticationClient(java.lang.String sessionUrl,
                            java.lang.String keyUrl,
                            javax.ws.rs.client.Client httpClient)
        Construct client implementation with session and key endpoints with overridden HTTP client
        Parameters:
        sessionUrl - Session Service URL base endpoint
        keyUrl - Key Service URL base endpoint
        httpClient - Http Client to use when communicating to the Session/Key endpoints.

      • AuthenticationClient

        public AuthenticationClient(java.lang.String sessionUrl,
                            java.lang.String keyUrl,
                            javax.ws.rs.client.Client httpClientForSessionToken,
                            javax.ws.rs.client.Client httpClientForKeyToken)
        Construct client implementation with session and key endpoints with two different overridden HTTP clients for session-token and key-token
        Parameters:
        sessionUrl - Session Service URL base endpoint
        keyUrl - Key Service URL base endpoint
        httpClientForSessionToken - Http Client to use when communicating to the session-token endpoint
        httpClientForKeyToken - Http Client to use when communicating to the key-token endpoint

    • Method Detail

      • authenticate

        public SymAuth authenticate()
                     throws AuthenticationException
        Authenticate and return session and key tokens encapsulated in SymAuth object.
        Returns:
        SymAuth object containing session and key tokens.
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - Exception generated from underlying REST API calls.

      • sessionLogout

        public void sessionLogout(SymAuth symAuth)
                   throws AuthenticationException
        Logout from an existing session
        Parameters:
        symAuth - SymAuth object containing session token to logout
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - Exception generated from underlying REST API calls.

      • authenticateExtensionApp

        public SymExtensionAppAuth authenticateExtensionApp(java.lang.String appToken)
                                             throws AuthenticationException
        Authentication call for Extensions API Applications. Returns
        Parameters:
        appToken - Arbitrary application token to assign session.
        Returns:
        SymExtensionAppAuth object containing session token and application ID.
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - Exception generated from underlying REST API calls.

      • setKeystores

        public void setKeystores(java.lang.String serverTruststore,
                         java.lang.String truststorePass,
                         java.lang.String clientKeystore,
                         java.lang.String keystorePass)
        Force registration of certificate stores
        Parameters:
        serverTruststore - Truststore file containing root and chain certs
        truststorePass - Truststore password
        clientKeystore - Client certificate keystore (P12) containing CN= bot user name
        keystorePass - Client keystore password
